scale.name: Scale
scale.description: Adjust the global molecule scale. If set to zero, the image widths will be unified. Otherwise, the structures will share the same bond length, but the image widths will vary.

unify-bond-length.name: Maximum width
unify-bond-length.description: Crop structure images that are too large in a multiline block.

unify-image-width.name: Image width
unify-image-width.description: Adjust the width of the molecule images. Only valid when 'scale' is set to zero.

light.name: Light theme
light.description: Active when Obsidian is under light mode.

dark.name: Dark theme
dark.description: Active when Obsidian is under dark mode.

sample.name: Sample SMILES strings
sample.description: Input SMILES strings to see the styled structures.

compact-drawing.name: Compact drawing
compact-drawing.description: Linearize simple structures and functional groups.

terminal-carbons.name: Show terminal carbons
terminal-carbons.description: Explictly draw terminal carbons like methyl or methylene.

scale.name: Scale factor
scale.description: Scaling the copied image. Larger scale will yield images with better resolution.

transparent.name: Transparent
transparent.description: Enable to yield a copied image with transparent background.

theme.name: Target theme
theme.description: Set the default theme of copied images.
